responsibilities: Research and develop cross-platform AR effect creation tools for the AI Effect Generation system.
Work closely with product managers and cross-functional teams to design and implement new features for TikTok's AI Effect Generation tools.
qualifications: Knowledge of Generative AI and Graphics technologies.
Ability to work collaboratively with cross-functional teams.
Strong research and development skills in AR effect creation.
analysis: The job responsibilities include researching and developing AR effect creation tools for an AI Effect Generation system and working with cross-functional teams to design and implement new features for TikTok's AI Effect Generation tools. The skills required include knowledge of Generative AI and Graphics technologies, which directly indicates involvement with Generative AI. The focus on AR effect creation and AI Effect Generation tools suggests that the job is centered around creating visual effects using AI, which is a common application of Generative AI. There is no mention of language models or tasks typically associated with LLMs, such as natural language processing or text generation.
